entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: WSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Freezing rain or rain beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or freezing rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
